Police, Customs bust significant Southland drug operation, two men charged https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-customs-bust--simpimant-southland-drug-operation-two-men-charged/6yftvwfnfzcbhblqbhblqwo4cefj6ky/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-customs-bust--simpimant-southland-drug-operation-two-men-charged/6yftvwfnfzcbhblqbhblqwo4cefj6ky/ Police swoop after package declared to be dining plates was actually plate-shaped MDMA. Fri, 31 Jan 2025 07:29:38 +0000 Police and Customs have busted an alleged signficant and sophisticated drug operation in Southland after a package labelled as dining plates - but which was actually MDMA disguised to look like plates (pictured) raised suspicions at the Auckland International Mail Centre.
